name: overdecoration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the use of too many things, colours, patterns, etc. on an object or in a place, in an effort to make it more attractive: The definition of glamour nowadays is quality, not details and overdecoration. Jan was responsible for the over-decoration of their apartments in London and Paris. Related words
decoration (MAKE ATTRACTIVE)
overdecorate
More examplesFewer examplesOverdecoration of a child's bedroom can lead to overstimulation.He overheard Tom insult him for the overdecoration of his home.Some people dislike the overdecoration of antique Japanese porcelain.
